meanings.definition: To formally declare one's abandonment or rejection of something.
meanings.sent1: She renounces all claims to the throne.
meanings.sent2: He renounces his membership in the club.
meanings.sent3: The cat renounces the new brand of food with a dramatic paw swipe.
meanings.sent4: The artist renounces traditional techniques and embraces a new style.
meanings.sent5: In the fairy tale, the princess renounces her royal title to live a simple life in the village.

meanings.definition: To give up or refuse to follow or adhere to something.
meanings.sent1: The athlete renounces the use of performance-enhancing drugs.
meanings.sent2: She renounces her unhealthy habits for a better lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: The robot renounces its programming and starts dancing instead of working.
meanings.sent4: The student renounces procrastination and starts studying diligently.
meanings.sent5: The superhero renounces his secret identity to protect his loved ones.

meanings.sent1: The father renounces his son for his criminal actions.
meanings.sent2: She renounces her former mentor for betraying her trust.
meanings.sent3: The magician renounces his old tricks and learns new illusions.
meanings.sent4: The company renounces its controversial policies to regain public trust.
meanings.sent5: The explorer renounces his failed expedition and plans a new adventure.
